content.rendered:
Mumbai is situated amidst some of the most serene and tranquil environment that offers some of the most peaceful getaway destinations. there are several hill stations here like – Lonavala, Mahabaleshwar, Alibag, Pune etc. along with hill stations there is not dearth of tourist attractions around Mumbai. We bring to your cost effective and worth it packages for Mumbai weekend getaway options for 3 days and 2 nights like – Mumbai Goa, Mumbai Saputara, Mumbai Mahabaleshwar and so much more. We can also customize these packages to suit your needs.

If you have an extended weekend coming up then these are some of the best choices of packages that you can select and take a quick time away from the bustle of the city life. Each place here is more attractive than the other and it should be visited by people looking for a getaway from the pollution and noise. Each of these packages enables you to have one of the most memorable time with your loved ones and friends at the best and the most exclusive rates. Book your package now!
